abstract: Interview with fashion designer Giambattista Valli, in which he discusses his 17th-century Parisian atelier and how his environment influences his work.
lead_paragraph: The designer talks about his 17th-century Parisian atelier and his work.

headline.main: Giambattista Valli: The Birth of Ideas, and Happy Moments
headline.print_headline: Where Giambattista Valli Hangs His Hats

snippet: The designer talks about his 17th-century Parisian atelier and his work.
